title: A Group Raised Money to Push Adams’s Agenda. Much of It Went to One Man.
description: A political action committee has given more money to its founder and his charter school than to candidates aligned with Mayor Eric Adams.
dc:creator: Nicholas Fandos and Dana Rubinstein
category: Striving for a Better New York (Political Action Committee)
media:credit: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
media:description: Mayor Eric Adams encouraged donors to give money to Striving for a Better New York, headlining the PAC’s major fund-raiser last year.
